name: IC 1318
description: This image presents a wide-field (nearly 4° on a side) view of the region around Sadr (γ Cygni). The bright and dark nebulae in the immediate vicinity of Sadr extend to the edge of the frame and far beyond. Several open star clusters decorate the field - most notably, M29 just to left of the bottom center. At bottom right is the Crescent Nebula, NGC 6888.
